from collections import defaultdict
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    for i in range(n):
        if arr[i] == 0:
            arr[i] = -1
    pSum = [0, arr[0]]
    for i in range(1, n):
        pSum.append(pSum[-1] + arr[i])
    l = defaultdict(int)
    last = defaultdict(int)
    ending_at = [0] * (n + 1)
    link = [-1] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(0, n + 1):
        curr = l[pSum[i] - 1] + 1
        ending_at[i] = curr
        if curr > 1:
            link[i] = last[pSum[i] - 1]
        l[pSum[i]] = curr
        last[pSum[i]] = i
    m = max(ending_at)
    print(m)
    for i in range(n, 0, -1):
        if ending_at[i] != m:
            continue
        curr = i
        res = []
        while True:
            res.append(curr + 1)
            if link[curr] == -1:
                break
            curr = link[curr]
        res.reverse()
        print(*res)
        break
